page.title: 19FARMING
page.content: {CROPS-}WHEAT,BARLEY,OILSEED RAPE, POTATOES(SECOND EARLIES AND MAINCROP) PEAS.THE ARABLE FARMS ARE HIGHLY MECHANISED AND MEDIUM TO LARGE IN SIZE.ONE OVER 3000 ACRES.{STOCK}SHEEP ABOUT HALF ARE THE NATIVE ROMNEYS,ONE SMALL FLOCK POLL DORSET THE REST ARE CROSS BREDS.THE MOST COMMON RAMS USED ARE ROMNEYS, SUFFOLK OR TEXEL. THE FLOCKS VARY FROM 40 EWES TO WELL OVER 1000 IN SIZE.ONE FARMER RUNS A LARGE SHEARING GANG. {CATTLE}THERE IS ONE MILKING HERD OF FRIESIAN COWS ON A SINGLE FARM. THERE ARE TWO SMALL{MARKET GARDENS PRODUCING RUNNER BEANS,LETTUCE AND BRUSSEL SPROUTS.APPLEDORES ANSWER SELLS TULIP AND DAFFODIL{BULBS. READING STREET HAS A{NURSERY/GARDEN {CENTRE. }
